data.title: Washington Wizards Mike Miller Remains Appreciative in Year 30 of Coaching Basketball
data.meta_description: "As coaches, we're very fortunate to get to do what we do." Assistant coach Mike Miller credits his high school […]
data.meta_site_name: The Official Website of The NBA Coaches Association |
data.text:
Great work by the Washington Wizards and Socios Hoops in covering Wizards Assistant Coach, Mike Miller. Over his 30-year coaching career, Coach Miller is appreciative for the opportunity to work with some of the best players and Coaches in the business – Coach states “I’ve been able to coach a long time and have built a lot of relationships, learned so many things, and hopefully been able to help people advance their careers.” Keep up the great work Coach!

Click here for the full video.
